Name: Robot Roll
Description: Internal function when robot clicks CALCULATE
Script: if(self.getvar(~arbex~)==7){var a = rand([1|2|3|4|5|6]); var b = rand([1|2|3|4|5|6]); givedice([a|b]); adjustrobotcounter(a+b); trace(a+b);}else{if(self.getvar(~arbex~)==9){giveequipment(rand(getequipment()));} sleep(0.1); robotroll();}
